Docs.summary: These methods are used to load, assemble, and start a web app.

Docs.summary: Start a web app using the given settings and entry point type, using defaults for items not specified.
Docs.returns: An IDisposible instance that can be called to shut down the web app.

Docs.summary: Start a web app using default settings and the given url and entry point. e.g. Discover the ServerFactory and run at the given url.
